meanings.definition: Resembling a spider in appearance or behavior.
meanings.sent1: The spideriest toy in the store had eight long legs.
meanings.sent2: The Halloween decorations included the spideriest fake spiders.
meanings.sent3: The spideriest costume at the party made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her room was the spideriest, with webs hanging from every corner.
meanings.sent5: The forest at night seemed even spiderier than during the day.

meanings.sent1: The spideriest corner of the basement was filled with webs.
meanings.sent2: The old barn was the spideriest building on the farm.
meanings.sent3: The spideriest room in the house was off-limits to visitors.
meanings.sent4: The attic was the spideriest place she had ever seen.
meanings.sent5: The garden shed was the spideriest spot in the yard.

meanings.definition: The most creepy or frightening, like a spider.
meanings.sent1: The spideriest in the movie scared the audience.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't stand the spideriest in the haunted house.
meanings.sent3: The spideriest in the story turned out to be a friendly character.
meanings.sent4: The spideriest in the room made her shiver with fear.
meanings.sent5: The spideriest in the legend was said to haunt the old castle.
